long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Safer is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your online security by providing real-time website safety checks. Whether you're surfing the web for work or leisure, Safer ensures you stay protected from malicious and unsafe websites.

Key Features:
• Real-Time Safety Checks: Automatically checks the safety of websites using Google Safe Browsing and advanced AI algorithms.
• Warning Alerts: Get instant alerts when you visit potentially harmful websites, protecting you from malware, phishing, and other online threats.
• Safe List Management: Easily manage a list of trusted websites to prevent unnecessary warnings for sites you frequently visit.
• Dark Mode Support: Safer adapts to your browser's dark mode settings for a seamless user experience.
• Easy to Use: Simple and intuitive interface that works seamlessly in the background to keep you safe.

Why Install Safer?
• Enhanced Security: Protect yourself from online threats with advanced safety checks.
• Peace of Mind: Browse with confidence knowing that Safer is monitoring the safety of every site you visit.
• User-Friendly: Safer works automatically, providing safety alerts without interrupting your browsing experience.
• Customizable: Add trusted websites to your safe list to avoid repetitive alerts.

How It Works:
1. Install Safer: Add Safer to your Chrome browser.
2. Browse as Usual: Continue browsing the web while Safer checks each site in real-time.
3. Receive Alerts: Get instant warnings if you visit an unsafe website.
4. Manage Safe List: Add frequently visited, trusted sites to your safe list.

Download Safer today and take control of your online security. Stay protected from online threats with ease and confidence.
